document.full_text: spain's supreme court on wednesday denied legal status to a new political party, sortu, which was created as a successor to batasuna, the banned political wing of an armed basque separatist group.
document.title: spain party is denied legal status
lines_and_colors: spain's supreme court on wednesday denied legal status to a new political party, sortu, which was created as a successor to batasuna, the banned political wing of an armed basque separatist group.
